about us

Learn more about our journey, core values, and the dedicated team behind our success.

our beginnings

small team, big dreams

In 2010, a small team of three passionate friends embarked on a journey fueled by a shared vision. Late nights in a tiny garage were spent brainstorming, coding, and dreaming big, all with the goal of creating transformative IT solutions.

From these humble beginnings, our dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction helped us overcome challenges and celebrate milestones. Through relentless innovation and hard work, we've built a company that continues to thrive and grow, always staying true to our roots.

never stop growing

leading in the industry

Today, CompGroup has established itself as a premier provider of IT services, delivering an extensive array of solutions ranging from digital design to digital security. Supported by a dedicated team of professionals and a passion for innovation, we consistently deliver top-tier services that adapt to the changing demands of our clientele. Our core principles of dependability, proficiency, and client-centricity propel us toward excellence in every endeavor.
